05788203528000.name: LIMITED EDITION DOUBLE-BREASTED SUIT BLAZER
05788203528000.description: Blazer regular fit made of wool blend fabric. Featuring a peak lapel collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a chest welt pocket, jetted hip pockets, an inside pocket, two back vents and double-breasted button fastening.

06861337800000.name: RELAXED FIT OVERSHIRT WITH POCKETS
06861337800000.description: Relaxed fit overshirt made of a cotton, linen and lyocell blend. Featuring a lapel collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest patch pockets and side pockets at the hip, and a button-up front.

00706663717000.name: RELAXED FIT FLOWING SHIRT
00706663717000.description: Relaxed fit shirt made from a lyocell blend fabric. Featuring a camp collar and short sleeves. Hem with side vents. Button-up front hidden by a placket.

07446307330000.name: FLORAL PRINT DENIM JACKET
07446307330000.description: Cropped fit jacket made of cotton denim. Featuring a lapel collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Welt pockets on the chest. Washed effect. Front button fastening hidden by a placket.

07446320600000.name: NCROPPED FIT JACKET
07446320600000.description: Cropped fit jacket made of cotton fabric. Featuring a lapel collar, long sleeve with buttoned cuffs, welt pockets on the chest and sides at the hip and a button-up front hidden by a placket.

04302340500000.name: EMBROIDERED ZIP-UP JACKET
04302340500000.description: Relaxed fit jacket made in cotton fabric. Featuring a lapel collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Combined contrasting embroidery on the front and back. Side pockets at the hip. Slightly faded effect. Zip-up fastening at the front.
